description: Ark is a plant-based restaurant, focusing on sustainability and innovative cuisine. Established in 2020, it evolved from a casual vegan caf√© to a fine dining experience, driven by a commitment to high-quality ingredients and minimizing waste. The restaurant emphasizes local sourcing and foraging, creating a unique dining experience that challenges perceptions of plant-based food. With multiple awards, Ark aims to redefine culinary excellence while promoting environmental responsibility.
name: Ark
